schema.name: 2018/11/02 Dinner Vegetables

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Tomatoes, Green Beans, Enoki Mushrooms, Bell Pepper, and Carrots under cold water.
Cut the Tomatoes into wedges, trim the Green Beans, slice the Mushrooms and Bell Pepper, and chop the Carrots into bite-sized pieces.
In a large skillet, melt the Butter over medium heat.
Add the chopped Carrots and Bell Pepper to the skillet. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in the Green Beans, Mushrooms, and Tomatoes. Cook for another 10 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Season with Thyme, Salt, and Pepper. Stir well to combine and ensure the vegetables are evenly coated with the seasonings.

schema.description: This wholesome '2018/11/02 Dinner Vegetables' dish combines the freshness and nutrients of a variety of vegetables enhanced with thyme, resulting in a low-carb, high-fiber meal that fits perfectly into healthy eating plans. Ideal for those looking to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing flavor.
